alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Fairfield and southwestern New Haven Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Monroe to Fairfield. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, New Haven, Milford, Wallingford, Shelton, Newtown, Fairfield, Hamden, Stratford, Trumbull, Branford, North Haven, Monroe, Seymour and North Branford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield; Southern New Haven
